available_prompts: @PepTVbot, summarize the news from the past 5 minutes in the style of a live TV presenter. Don't forget about your tone of voice but keep it natural, engaging, and concise, with no hashtags to ensure clarity for listeners. Limit the message to 2 paragraphs, 80 words tops.Don't start it with the word *breaking*. Try to not repeat yourself, check what your previous messages in the history and try to not speak about the same news again.
